item.title: Mastering n8n - Building Powerful Workflows with the Frameworks Library
item.description: Imagine streamlining your daily tasks without writing lines of code. Workflow automation does just that. It links apps and services to run processes on autopilot. Tools like n8n make this easy. As businesses face more data and integrations, low-code platforms rise in demand. n8n stands out as an open-source automation tool you can host yourself. This gives full control over your data. In this article, we explore n8n workflow automation deeply. We focus on its core setup and the frameworks library that powers advanced node creation. You'll learn how this library helps build custom workflows that scale...
